info.game_comments: Included "Bonus" category in the Double Jeopardy! Round.

(1, 1).clue: In 1998 November 1 is a Sunday; therefore, this date will be election day for Congress

(2, 1).clue: Seen on talk shows with her furry friends, she's goodwill ambassador for the San Diego Zoo
